Really sad to share the news that Unbounce closed the Montreal office yesterday and laid off most of the staff – around 15 people. I left the company last month without knowing this was about to go down. These are incredible people with amazing talents and any business would be lucky to have them. Don't hesitate to DM me if you'd like to know more about who is available :)

Sending love to: @Stephanie Saretsky (marketing/multimedia production) Jonathan Marsan (data/marketing) Alejandra Cabrera (data) @Melissa Friday (HR) Amanda Durepos (content/marketing) Keith Odell (customer success) Michael James Doyle (customer success) Lakshmi Sharma (sales/technical ops) Joel McDonald (sales) @Justin Veenema (customer success/marketing) Stephanie Galati (customer success/technical ops) Les Bakker (customer success) Victor Zamudio (customer success) Natasha Jadavji (customer support) Becky Godglick (customer support)

Responsible for overall customer acquisition growth through our 850+ app partners.• Deepening partnerships with top app partners to be present in new product launches• Enabling partners to build Zapier into their apps (released our first-ever API)• Designing and piloting a channel partner program• Focusing on partner experience via our platform and engagement

Growing your SaaS business in the SMB space can be difficult. The Small Business Web aims to change that by bringing together the top minds in the SaaS space in a spirit of collaboration and growth.As a strategic advisor, I oversee all topics, content, and presentations shared to the community about growing a successful platform.

Pure Chat is changing the way that true small businesses use mobile friendly chat software to capture leads and close sales. I consult the company on growth strategy through strategic partnerships and partner channels.
Sr. Manager, Strategic Partnerships - Business Development

Infusionsoft depends on strategic partners to better the lives of small businesses. I oversee the following:• Identifying new partnerships to drive customer acquisition and revenue• Working with partners to explore and develop distribution channels for next generation technology• Extending the capability of Infusionsoft via integrations with other SMB tools and our ecosystem of partners• Co-marketing with partners for thought leadership, lead generation, and revenue opportunities

Responsible for the research, creation, and revenue associated with Infusionsoft's industry products.• Partnered with industry leaders• Co-created industry specific products and solutions• Co-promoted & sold over $3m+ in new product revenue in less than 12 months• Led cross-departmental planning of training programs, support, and sales initiatives• Pioneered new software technology with development to enable Infusionsoft's campaign sharing strategy, which now accounts for roughly 45% of Infusionsoft's current revenue

I have had the opportunity to work with Cody over the past year as our two companies have invested in a mutually beneficial partnership. Working with Cody has been a real pleasure! It's rare in exploring partnerships that you work with someone that has the vision to see the opportunity but the experience to also caution against potential pitfalls. It's this critical combination that allows you to not just form a partnership, but to execute on it. One of Cody's greatest strengths is his ability to execute, which is ultimately the most important aspect of Business Development.

Bill Hoffman
Listen, Learn and share your experiences every day.
October 12, 2014, Bill was senior to Cody but didn’t manage directly

I have known Cody for 2 years now and have seen a real transformation from individual contributor to leader. Cody was the top performer on a high performance sales team for many years. For many that does not translate into growth as a strategic leader, for Cody it did. Cody is the person Infusionsoft puts into roles that are "a good idea" but need someone to drive the strategy across all departments and external channels and co-create to make it successful. This is where I have seen the most growth... from singularly focused sales person to cross channel strategic leader Cody sees the big picture and enrolls the right people to build something to success or determine it does not merit focus and move on to the next. Cross collaboration, business development, motivating people that do not work for you (internally and externally) are skills that Cody has gotten very good at. The biggest area of growth I have seen from Cody is humility and a willingness to understand that NO LEADERS do things alone... he is asking great questions of people that have been there, and using what he learns. I appreciate Cody as a motivated entrepreneur with a passion for Infusionsofts customers and partners and most importantly his ability to be agile and work in ambiguity...

She is sharp, detail oriented, and doesn't let things fall through the cracks. I can't recoomend her enough!

Ylan Kunstler
Strategic Business Development at BigCommerce
May 19, 2017, Cody worked with Ylan but at different companies

Ylan is one of those people that you instantly feel at ease with, the type of person that allows you to drop your guard and get right down to the business at hand. With an intuitive understanding of partnerships and designing win-win scenarios, working with Ylan is just a pleasure to do. After a few months of trying to put together a deeper partnership with other team members, Ylan was able to step in, identify the needs of our mutual users, and immediately put together a plan of attack for both sides to focus on executing. While I could go on about Ylan's attention to detail, communication skills, his ability to rally his team, etc. what I like most about working with him is that he's just a good guy, period. I cannot recommend him enough!

summary: I have 10+ years of experience in the SaaS software business with a track record of creating successful partnerships, joint products, and winning sales teams. I’m extremely passionate about small business and startups, and have been fortunate to be involved with fast-growing SaaS startups since the inception of the industry. I currently head up Business Development and Strategic Partnerships at Zapier, focused on growing our mutual customer bases through integration, co-marketing, joint product launches, and thought leadership. Are you fiercely committed to small business? If so, I'd love to enlist your help as we look for partners to join us in our purpose of connecting the world for small business. Here's what I'm focused on every day to drive our mutual success:- Seeking out joint partnerships with companies that provide solutions can help our small business customers grow- Co-marketing effective tools and solutions to our mutual customer bases- Leveraging Zapier's solutions to add stickiness to your app by instantly connecting to 850+ SaaS applicationsIf any of these opportunities seem to align to your needs, let's connect and explore working together.About Zapier:Zapier gives people internet superpowers by letting them easily connect and automate the apps they use. Partners, including Salesforce, Intuit, Google, Dropbox, and more utilize Zapier to offer their customers integrations with over 900+ apps. The Zapier Developer Platform enables developers to add APIs for private or public use. Zapier is a Y Combinator-backed company with over 2M users and growing fast.SPECIALTIES:• Business Development• Partnerships• Lead Generation• Joint Ventures• Sales Strategy• Sales Organization• Revenue Attainment• Marketing Automation• Internet Marketing• CRM Software• Ecommerce Software• SaaS• SMB - Small Business
name: Cody Jones
title: Head of Partnerships at Zapier
